content: 2001 Singaporean TV series or program ***A War Diary*** is a 2001 [Singaporean](/wiki/Singapore) television series produced by Dream Forest Production. Set in the time of [World War II](/wiki/World_War_II), the series depicts the [Battle of Singapore](/wiki/Battle_of_Singapore) and life in [Japanese-occupied Singapore](/wiki/Japanese_occupation_of_Singapore) from the point of view of an ethnic Chinese family. The dialogue, however, is primarily in English as the series was aired on the English-language television channel [MediaCorp Channel 5](/wiki/Channel_5_(Singaporean_TV_channel)). The series was nominated for four [Asian Television Awards](/wiki/Asian_Television_Awards) in 2002, including Best Drama Series. ## Cast - [Tay Ping Hui](/wiki/Tay_Ping_Hui) as Lim Teck Meng - Don Lim as Lim Teck Hock - [James Taenaka](/wiki/Jimmy_Taenaka) as Lieutenant Kinoshita Kenji - [Winston Chao](/wiki/Winston_Chao) as the resistance leader - [Tan Kheng Hua](/wiki/Tan_Kheng_Hua) as Lim Swee Neo - [Fiona Xie](/wiki/Fiona_Xie) as Rita Lim - [Carole Lin](/wiki/Carole_Lin) as Bee Lian - Valentine Cawley as [Stanley Warren](/wiki/Stanley_Warren) - [Keagan Kang](/wiki/Keagan_Kang) as Simon DeSouza - Tracy Tan as Susan - [Aaron Aziz](/wiki/Aaron_Aziz) - Robin Leong - Samuel He - Lim Yu Beng - Tony Quek - Jomar Staverløkk - *A War Diary* at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) - *A War Diary* at MediaCorp.sg - Dream Forest Productions This drama television program–related article is a stub. title: A War Diary
